pageMainContent:
Our History

Hansen's Flower Shop and Greenhouse has proudly served Fairfield County since 1920. We are family owned and operated. Hansen's Flower shop has been voted Best Florist each year since 1999 by the Fairfield County Weekly. We are committed to offering only the finest floral arrangements and gifts, backed by service that is friendly and prompt. Because all of our customers are important, our professional staff is dedicated to making your experience a pleasant one. That is why we always go the extra mile to make your floral gift perfect.
Let Hansen's Flower Shop and Greenhouse be your first choice for flowers.

 

A Family of Florists:
Bruce's Flower Shop: 454 Main Avenue, Norwalk
Irene's Flower Shop: 600 Main Street, Monroe
Hansen's Floral Arts: 240 Post Road East, Westport

Events At Our Flower Shop

See below for our exciting 2015 event calendar. Please join us for our design classes and floral expos to get an inside look into how to create your very own floral designs. We also offer open house days at our greenhouse where you can take a look around and take home something of your own from our local garden.

    • 1/5 - Winter floral design class
    • 1/13 - Greenhouse open house

  • Feb
